summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of McClellan Street, from the east margin of Mt. Baker Boulevard to the east margin of Mt. Rainier Drive; Mt. Rainier Drive from the south margin of McClellan Street to the south margin of Ridgway Place, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing side sewer connections, in accordance with Resolution No. 1866 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
